name: Love Stinks
description:
how to play:

scroll up: get close to fish

scroll down: get away from fish

click on fish when close to show affection 

click on toilet lid to control the smell

this game is a part of a series in which i make 1 prototype a week based on a prompt.

this week's prompt was make a game using premade assets. i usually only make games in 2d, so i was really out of my element with this one.
